mapper.sql: id, mtall, mtsuc, mtdissuc, moall, moable, moableice, moabledx, moablellb, modisable, orderall, ordersuc, ordersucdx, ordersucllb, orderdissuc, orderdissucdx, orderdissucllb, icesuc, mtrate, morate, modxrate, mollbrate, moicerate, orderrate, resorderrate, ordersucrate, ordersucdxrate, ordersucllbrate, add_time
mapper.select:
select
from data_total where add_time like '${adtime}%'

select
from data_total where date_sub(CURRENT_DATE,interval #{delay} day)<date(add_time) order by add_time DESC limit #{start},#{limit}
select count(1) from data_total where date_sub(CURRENT_DATE,interval #{delay} day)<date(add_time)

select
from data_total WHERE DATE_FORMAT( add_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{sectime}, '%Y%m' )
